name: test_NAF_2_4_0_stay_logged_in_quick
description:
Test Case: NAF-19
    As a user, I want to stay logged in for as long as possible, so that I don't have to log in frequently
    Scenario: Stay Logged In (Quick Test - 30 seconds)
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, user is already logged in
    2. Close the app, wait for 30 seconds
    3. Open the app, User is still logged in and is redirected to the Home page
descriptionHtml:
Test Case: NAF-19
As a user, I want to stay logged in for as long as possible, so that I don't have to log in frequently
Scenario: Stay Logged In (Quick Test - 30 seconds)

Steps:
1. Open the app, user is already logged in
2. Close the app, wait for 30 seconds
3. Open the app, User is still logged in and is redirected to the Home page
